definition: (of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume

sentences.english: The seriousness of the guard's face is in great contrast with the walkers in different colors .
sentences.chinese: 哨兵的一臉嚴肅與行人五顏六色的妝容判若兩個時代。

sentences.english: The permanent effects will keep you a clear make -up all day long.
sentences.chinese: 效果持久，令你的妝容保持一整天的清晰自然。

sentences.english: Third, mineral makeup gives complete coverage for all kinds of skin imperfections.
sentences.chinese: 然後，礦物化妝品給所有的皮膚一個很精緻的妝容。

sentences.english: Cover with moderate effect, create a perfect 8-hour long-lasting makeup.
sentences.chinese: 具有中度遮蓋效果，締造8小時持久的完美無暇妝容。

sentences.english: Joe the lotus building is ten, the fine makeup has been all gone.
sentences.chinese: 喬蓮房拾頭，精緻的妝容已蕩然無存。

sentences.english: She carried a mirror in her purse so she could check her makeup .
sentences.chinese: 她在手提包裏放了一面鏡子，這樣隨時可以檢查妝容。

definition: (of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
